description: Cauliflower in a cheesecake? This super-smooth and creamy dessert will surprise you with its sweet and satisfying flavour.
name: Creamy Cauliflower Cheesecake Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 cup thickened cream, whipped, to serve

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 160Â°C. Line base of a 20cm round springform tin with baking paper.
Add biscuits to a food processor and process until finely crumbed. Add butter and process to combine. Transfer to tin and press over base. Chill.
Meanwhile, process cauliflower in a food processor until finely chopped. Add ricotta, cream cheese, sugar, eggs, vanilla, lemon rind and juice.
Process until smooth. Stir in sultanas. Pour over the biscuit base.
Bake for 45 minutes or until cheesecake sets. Turn off oven and leave cake, with door ajar, for at least 3 hours to cool. Refrigerate overnight.
Transfer cheesecake to a plate. Top with cream and zest to serve.
